q: Andy Coulson . Mr Andy Coulson is to step down amid continuing allegations regarding phone hacking at the News of the World. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget.`` That's when you get the goose bumps,'' Allen Iverson said. You honestly don't really feel it when the Robert Horrys are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there. The Philadelphia star scored 60 points, a career high and the most in the NBA this seJason Kidd, to lead the 76ers to a 112-99 victory over the Orlando Magic on Saturday night. Robert King , who produces the show with his wife Michelle, said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert King said. But Keith Urbahn , who works for the former defense secretary, said the idea rules Donald Rumsfeld out.`` This area is so fraught with legal ramifications,'' Keith Urbahn said.``
